duties_responsibilities.duty: Welcome patients and conduct check-in with required forms
Work in partnership with Prosano leadership to provide seamless and integrated service to our patients
Lead the scheduling and patient visit coordination functions within the practice management system
Ensure our patients are always delighted with the level of care they receive
As an ambassador in the local community – and nurturing relationships with other healthcare providers, social/community organizations, and marketing partners

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required. Bachelor’s degree preferred. Medical Assistant Certification preferred. BLS Certification Required.
